dmca.title: Notice of Improper Activity and Evidence Preservation Request - http://www.gotocertif
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: MSAntiPiracy03 [mailto:Internet3@microsoft-antipiracy.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, September 19, 2006 6:40 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice of Improper Activity and Evidence Preservation
Request - http://www.gotocertify.com/index.htm,
http://www.gotocertify.com/pr.htm - MS Ref. 54871
Subject: Notice of Improper Activity and Evidence Preservation Request -
http://www.gotocertify.com/index.htm, http://www.gotocertify.com/pr.htm
- MS Ref. 54871


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA256

 
VIA EMAIL: 
 
Date: 19 September 2006 
 
URL: http://www.gotocertify.com/index.htm,
http://www.gotocertify.com/pr.htm Date of Activity: 19 September 2006
 
Dear Sir or Madam,
 
Microsoft Corporation has received information that the URL addresses,
http://www.gotocertify.com/index.htm, http://www.gotocertify.com/pr.htm,
and e-mail addresses, service@gotocertify.com, cert@gotocertify.com,
help@gotocertify.com, which appear to be on servers under your control,
are offering to provide improperly obtained and transferred Microsoft
certifications to people that have not themselves registered for, taken,
and passed Microsoft's certification tests as required by Microsoft for
such certification.  Based on our investigation it appears that the
offer for certifications is unauthorized and unrelated to Microsoft, and
likely constitutes an improper attempt to deceive customers into paying
substantial sums of money by indicating that their certification
achieved via such proxy-testing is legitimate and/or authorized by
Microsoft.
 
As you know, illegal on-line activities can be highly damaging for the
victims.  We are therefore asking that you investigate the website at
issue and consider whether this activity is in violation of your terms
of service.  In order to protect innocent visitors to the site from
being misled, injured, or defrauded, we request that you remove the
pages located at http://www.gotocertify.com/index.htm,
http://www.gotocertify.com/pr.htm from your service, and suspend service
to service@gotocertify.com, cert@gotocertify.com, help@gotocertify.com,
as soon as possible.
 
We also make the urgent request that you take the necessary action to
prevent the destruction of and to preserve all records in your custody
or control related to this Internet site, account holder or subscriber,
including without limitation, electronic records, customer and billing
information, log files and other session data, documentation and any
other information relating to this account.
 
If you have any questions, please contact us by replying to this email.
We appreciate your prompt cooperation in this matter. Please advise us
regarding what actions you take.
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
Emma Rutherford 
 
Internet Investigator
on behalf of Microsoft Corporation
One Microsoft Way
Redmond, WA 98052
United States of America
E-mail: internet1@microsoft-onlinesafety.com


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
